description:
On November 28, 2022, @elonmusk tweeted "Apple has mostly stopped advertising on Twitter. Do they hate free speech in America?" and followed up with 
"Apple has also threatened to withhold Twitter from its App Store, but won’t tell us why"
(https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1597300125243944961).

This is a market on whether Apple follows through with their alleged threat. This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Twitter app is removed from the Apple app store by December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Apple and the Apple App Store, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

markets.question: Will Twitter be removed from the Apple app store by EOY?

title: Will Twitter be removed from the Apple app store by EOY?
